kvs.subtitle: --- FAIR DAO (Fair and Transparent Decentralized Autonomous Organization)
kvs.subdescription: The FAIR token is fairly launched on the SunPump platform with ultra-low Gas, no pre-sale, no additional issuance, and no allocation plans.
kvs.page-description-opensource: We have open-sourced most of our code. If you have free time, you can join us to collectively promote the development of FAIR DAO.
kvs.dao-1-des: The FAIR protocol is managed by a decentralized global community, allowing all FAIR token holders, developers, and ecosystem participants to propose ideas and suggestions for community governance.
kvs.dao-2-des: All votes in FAIR DAO are conducted on the blockchain, ensuring that no one can tamper with them, thus guaranteeing the fairness, efficiency, and transparency of governance.
kvs.dao-3: No Pre-sale Mechanism, No Team Allocation
kvs.dao-3-des: Everyone is equal. The Fair token is issued and traded on the SunPump platform without any pre-sale mechanism or team allocation.
kvs.dao-4-des: Ecosystem participants can build open-source applications by staking Fair tokens, creating a thriving ecosystem together.

open-items.name: Shared Lib
open-items.des: FAIR DAO Shared Library for rapid development of desktop and mobile applications, supporting mainstream mobile devices, PCs, and web browsers.

open-items.name: Eco Apps
open-items.des: Fair Box serves as the carrier for ecosystem applications, integrating Tron wallet and Ethereum wallet.

open-items.name: Official Site
open-items.des: Source code for the current website
